mapper.select: SELECT idx AS image_idx, origin_filename, url FROM IMAGE WHERE thumbnail_yn='Y' AND type = "L" AND mapping_idx = #{location_idx}
SELECT k.idx AS keword_idx, k.keyword FROM KEYWORD k JOIN LOCATION_KEYWORD lk ON (k.idx = lk.keyword_idx) WHERE lk.location_idx = #{location_idx} ORDER BY k.create_date DESC
SELECT keyword FROM LOCATION_KEYWORD lk JOIN KEYWORD k ON(lk.keyword_idx = k.idx) WHERE lk.location_idx = #{location_idx} ORDER BY k.create_date DESC
SELECT l.idx AS location_idx , l.name , l.area , (SELECT url FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx = l.idx AND type = 'L' AND thumbnail_yn = 'Y') AS image FROM LOCATION l ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
